nodes.text: Huttslayer Splash was a type of beverage served at the castle of the pirate Maz Kanata on the planet Takodana. At some point between 4 and 5 ABY, a 3PO-series protocol droid working at the castle received an order that included a Huttslayer Splash on the rocks, along with a Port in a Storm, two Twi'lek Toppers and a triple-shaken Outer Rim and Fizz. The droid successfully made the order but then could not remember which table to take the drinks to.
Huttslayer Splash was first mentioned in the 2017 video game Star Wars Battlefront II.
